name: Falling Voice
description:
This is a magic tour to test player’s graphic vision and fast logical thinking.
A flat style of game art design.
It has access to  game center rankings so players can compete with other players worldwide .

Match
Match the falling figure with the one in the first color block.

Array
Click any color block to move it to the last line, then adjust accordingly to match multiple drop .

Challenge
Slowly increased difficulty and multiple patterns bring new  challenges .

The game contains 2 player modes: daily challenges and endless mode.
Every drop of daily challenges is fixed while the endless mode is random. It’s a challenge of player’s memory and response ability.
Every time when a successful match is made, players will be congratulated with wonderful voice.
With the artistic conception of Zen, it help player to get their own peace of mind.
